about_the_game:
How can a grain of sand find its family among all the other grains of sand on a vast beach?

Sim was a grain of sand living peacefully with its family on the beach. One day, a dark cloud arrived and disrupted their tranquility. A gust of wind blew, separating Sim from its family.
At first, Sim was scared, but it knew it had to find its family. So, it set out on a journey. Along the way, it encountered an angry bee, passed by spider webs, and met a knowledgeable ant.
The ant supported Sim and granted it abilities to help on its journey.

Your task here is to assist Sim in overcoming the challenges it faces, guiding it to reach its family in this arduous journey!

  • -Help Sim collect the most suitable material for each obstacle to overcome them!

  • -Gather minerals and hurl them. Break through obstacles! Propel Sim forward on its journey!
    Oh no, are the minerals depleted? Then make use of the remnants of shattered barriers.

  • -Water is a friend! Of course, if you know how to use it.
    Sim is denser than water, but this can change at any moment. Minerals can assist you in this regard!

  • -Things may not always go smoothly. Be prepared for tense moments!
    Sim is just a grain of sand. How big could it be? But don't forget that there are things much larger than Sim.

  • -Don't hesitate to seek help in challenging situations!
    Utilize the assistance of some of the friends you encounter on your journey to overcome the disadvantages of Sim's small size.

  • -Turn crisis into opportunity! Use your enemies' weak points to bring them to your side.
    Can an enemy also be a friend? With a little sacrifice, why not?

    You will pass through various different places on your journey.

  • -Navigate through tall plants to cross the canyon.
    Gigantic plants will block your view compared to Sim's size. Find your way by climbing to a high point and enjoy the enchanting scenery of the micro world!

  • -Search for a way in and out of a hive filled with larvae.
    Be careful inside the hive. After all, the larvae have a guardian.

  • -Attempt to escape from a cave teeming with hundreds of spiders.
    You might have stumbled into rush hour because an entire colony is converging upon you!

  • -Find a path to salvation in an ant nest where science is produced.
    They say ants are hardworking. They can help you.

Sim's family is waiting. Let this be your motivation.
GOOD LUCK!

name: Sim the Sand
short_description: "Sim The Sand" is an exhilarating adventure game, blending low-poly TPS visuals and music to immerse players in the enigmatic atmosphere of the micro world. Join Sim, a grain of sand, on a perilous journey to reunite with its family amidst danger and challenges.
